content: so you ve jumped on the bandwagon too the kids want one all your friends have asked you to make one the grands would look so cute in one and you may as well make one for the cat the dog ferrets chickens goats goldfish and chia pet while you re at it you ve looked everywhere for an easy pattern that won t take hours to complete you ve found it to add to the simplicity this pattern is mostly worked in a continuous round so it will not have an ugly visible seam running down the back or side when this craze started i didn t have a pattern to go by but i wanted to try my hand at it as it just so happens hats are my favorite thing to crochet and i have at least 9 2 million designs floating around in my head at all times so here s my free contribution to the fad enjoy this is a beginner to intermediate pattern with detailed instructions if you use the suggested yarn you will get a beautiful self-striping effect this pattern is worked from top down using a salon quality elastic band or not your choice
